title: Where is Year of the Rooster Bundle?
body: I was under the impression the Year of the Rooster bundle was supposed to last until February 2nd but I can't find it anywhere on the store. My friends are having this issue as well. What's going on?

replies.body: I checked the store and was able to locate a Year of the Rooster set.  Are you still have this issue?  If so, are you on the updated or legacy client?  Let me know!

Hi Porocles :)

There might be a bunch of such posts floating around actually.^^"
The bundle went MIA over the weekend sometime after the FPS issues with the rooster ward were discovered.  The bundle showed back up in the shop late this morning (idk if the issues were resolved or not though).

Ah!  We were looking at fps issues that were occurring, but  everything should be okay now.  Assuming those posts might be older, then the issue should now  resolved.  Do let me know if this is still a problem!
